RoseHosting has been providing top notch hosting services to thousands of customers around the world since 2001. We were the first and only web hosting company in the world to offer commercial Linux virtual servers. This year we are proudly celebrating our 16th Anniversary. Let's celebrate together with our best SSD VPS Hosting plans.

Join us now and get 10% OFF our regular prices and keep the low price forever using the promotional code 16YEARS

For your peace of mind, we offer an unconditional 7-days money-back guarantee. In case you are unsatisfied for any reason, we will give you a full refund of your money. No delays, no hassles and no questions asked!

Our Linux VPS hosting plans are fully managed and created to suit all customer needs:

With all our VPS hosting plans you can select your desired Linux OS by our wide list of OS templates (both 32bit and 64bit versions): CentOS, Debian, Fedora, Ubuntu, Elastix, OpenSUSE, Arch-Linux and Scientific Linux

All of our plans come with:

  • Full Root Access
  • Fully Managed Support
  • FREE software installation and configuration
  • FREE website migration
  • FREE Weekly backup of your VPS
  • FREE Webmin Control Panel
  • One of a kind US based 24/7 EPIC technical support
  • 16 years of experience providing Linux VPS service
  • Host unlimited domains
  • 100% Uptime Guarantee
  • All servers have RAID1 or RAID5 and redundant power supplies
  • Remote VPS control panel
  • Firewall Protection
... and more

Your SSD virtual server will be on a fully burstable Gigabit LAN. The connection to the Internet is through Savvis, Broadwing, Qwest and Verio/Cogent - 100% premium bandwidth, all 10 GigE or better. The data center has redundant UPS power systems and is powered by two separate power grids. It also has a site-wide redundant air conditioning systems and dry fire extinguishing systems.

If you want to check the full specifications of our SSD VPS hosting plans please visit Linux Virtual Server Hosting - RoseHosting.com and find which one will suit your needs best.

All of this is backed up by our knowledgeable and experienced 24x7 EPIC US-based Support staff.
